description: Lists all stacks that are importing an exported output value. To modify or remove an exported output value, first use this action to see which stacks are using it. To see the exported output values in your account, see  ListExports. For more information about importing an exported output value, see the Fn::ImportValue function.

parameters.name: ExportName
parameters.description: The name of the exported output value. CloudFormation returns the stack names that are importing this value.

nested_items.name: Imports
nested_items.description: A list of stack names that are importing the specified exported output value.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A string that identifies the next page of exports. If there is no additional page, this value is null.
